short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Imp Information for Debugging Conga Issues

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1.4 - Added toggle to enable/disable Custom Triggers.

1.3 - Added functionality to view CPQ callback classes. Included Conga CPQ Objects in view custom trigger functionality.

1.2 - Added functionality to view custom trigger on Conga CLM Objects. Included C1 products in package version checker.

1.1 - Added Lightning Support. The tool uses Tooling API so might not work in case logged in user does not have required permissions. 

1.0 - The Extension allows you to find Conga Packages and their Version without needing to go to the Installed Packages tab. Works only in Salesforce Classic for now.
